page.title: 04Arable farms,few animals.
page.content: Most of the land in our area is farmland.The farms are mainly arable farms.Cereals are grown right down on the flood plain of the river.The most popular crop is Wheat,with barley second.Beans,Rape and Apple orchards are some of the other crops grown.One of the largest farms is Ulting Hall farm.The crops are typical of the area.It is a farm with 600 acres of land surrounding the house.Crops grown are:{Wheat 300 acres, Barley 200 acres {Beans 100 acres}Some chickens are kept and the farm used to keep livestock. There are 14 workers on the farm and 2 apprentices. The farmer has three new pieces of equipment:{low ground {pressure sprayer ,tractor and combine {harvester.}The farmer is concerned about EEC food policies and says his wheat crop has to be high quality or the EEC won't buy any surplus.
